settings.heading: Christie Vanover x Spiceology
settings.content: Hi. I’m Christie Vanover ... competitive BBQer, certified barbecue judge, and did I mention I own more than 30 outdoor cookers? You can always find me hovering over a grill, smoker or campfire armed with my two favorite things: my tongs and a glass of wine.

settings.heading: About Christie Vanover
